name: chatgpt-project-explorer
title: ChatGPT Project Explorer
description: Search and open your ChatGPT projects
author: raycast

preferences.name: apiUrl
preferences.title: API URL
preferences.description: Base URL of your Project Index API (e.g., https://your-api.com or https://xyz.supabase.co/rest/v1)

preferences.name: recentCount
preferences.title: Recent Projects Count
preferences.description: Number of recently opened projects to show at the top (0 to disable)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
